title: Should my friend switch from a BSc in computer science to an MA in philosophy and maths if she doesn't like programming and really enjoys philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: On the face of it, I would say yes (for obvious reasons). More importantly, if she’d focus on logic and takes a minor in computer science, she’d still be able to obtain a respectable proficiency in computer science and coding.
It depends on what she wants for her future? The Coputer science might get her work and then she can philosophize, after she obtained some insights into it.
